alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 06 at 3:59AM AKST until March 07 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to 0.10 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow and ice will likely accumulate Monday night and Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
